ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.2.0 on 2024-11-30T20:44:41 [Issue ID 4000-97190] urn:comicvine:4000-97190
ComicInfo.Penciller: Dave Roberts,Dick Ayers,Mark Heike,Richard Pollard,Rik Levins
ComicInfo.Summary: All color!!! As the Femforce, the Sentinels and the Vault Heroes stage an all-out brawl at a press conferance,Darkfire is having her doubts. Playing both ends against the middle as a double-agent for General Gordon, the villainous League Of Alternative Science accepts her as one of there own. But when it's time to "get in out of the cold", how will she break free ? In the end, Gordon relents and lets the "old" Sentinels join the new, and allows Paragon to keep his code name. "Regrets And Broken Hearts" is written by Bill Black, drawn by Richard Pollard, Mark Heike and Dick Ayers, and inked by Heike, Bill Black and Chad Hunt. Guest Starring Yankee Girl, The Hood, Catman and Kitten, Miss Masque, The Avenger, Commando D, Scarlet Scorpion, Paragon, The Green Lama, American Crusader, Captain Flash, Nikki Latimer, Reddevil, Rocketman and Jetgirl, Dr. and Margo Nadeau, and Dr. Macabre. Then, Dragonfly returns , and when she gets wind of an upcoming Femforce movie (that she isn't going to get a cut of money on.) she's hopping mad, in "No Room Left On The Gravy Train", written by Mark Heike, drawn by Dave Roberts, and inked by Chris Allen. Color cover by Rik Levins, full color throughout. Standard comic book format.
ComicInfo.Title: No Room Left On The Gravy Train (Part One); Chapter Two; Regrets And Broken Hearts! (Chapter 1)
